inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History of total or near total thyroidectomy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: BMI less than or equal to 20 or greater than or equal to 30 kg/m(2)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Metastatic thyroid cancer or history of thyroid cancer with high risk of recurrence
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, on replacement therapy for 3 years. No contraindications mentioned.
